text: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَكُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذْتُمُ ٱلْعِجْلَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمْ ظَـٰلِمُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And Moses had certainly brought you clear proofs. Then you took the calf [in worship] after that, while you were wrongdoers.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya Musa telah datang kepadamu membawa bukti-bukti kebenaran (mukjizat), kemudian kamu jadikan anak sapi (sebagai sembahan) sesudah (kepergian)nya, dan sebenarnya kamu adalah orang-orang yang zalim.
